## Summary

This PR introduces three major features developed through PRD-driven development:

### 1. Employee Tags Sync \(December 2025\)
- Syncs employee tags/categories from Odoo `hr.employee.category`
- Many-to-many relationship with employees via `employee_tag_associations` table
- Full audit logging for tag operations
- REST API endpoints: `GET /api/tags/`, `GET /api/employees/{id}/tags`
- Tags displayed as badges on employee detail page

### 2. Project Explorer \(December 2025\)
- New "Reports" section with advanced project analysis
- Multi-dimensional filtering \(customer, tags, date range, name search\)
- Timesheet analysis with Month/Quarter/Year views and Chart.js visualizations
- New `project_analyst` role for access control
- On-demand Odoo data fetching with 5-minute caching

### 3. Unified Assignment Modal \(January 2025\)
- Single modal for all assignment creation scenarios
- Support for both regular projects and meta-projects
- Date range selection with weekday filtering
- Rotation pattern application with conflict preview
- Bulk assignment creation

## Key Changes
- 61 files changed, ~12,700 lines added
- New database migrations for tags and project_analyst role
- Comprehensive test coverage \(25+ tests for project explorer service\)
- Updated CLAUDE.md documentation

- [ ] Run `uv run pytest tests/test_project_explorer_service.py -v`

- [ ] Test project explorer at `/reports/project-explorer`
- [ ] Test unified assignment modal from dashboard
- [ ] Verify role-based access for project_analyst features
